description.zh-cn: 中华民国及中华人民共和国时期的经济学家、教育家、人口学家，以其《新人口论》和对中国计划生育政策的早期倡导而闻名。曾任北京大学及浙江大学校长。
description.en: An economist, educator, and demographer during the Republic of China and People's Republic of China eras, famous for his "New Population Theory" and early advocacy for China's family planning policy. He served as the president of Peking University and Zhejiang University.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代第一所现代大学，天津大学的前身。
description.en: The first modern university in China, the predecessor of Tianjin University.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国的私立研究型大学。
description.en: A private research university in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国的私立研究型大学。
description.en: A private research university in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国的私立研究型大学。
description.en: A private research university in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 中国的顶尖高等学府之一。
description.en: One of the top institutions of higher learning in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国教育家、革命家，曾任北京大学校长。
description.en: A Chinese educator and revolutionary who served as the president of Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 中国马克思主义的先驱，中国共产党的创始人之一。
description.en: A pioneer of Marxism in China and one of the founders of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期的银行家和政治家，曾任财政部长。
description.en: A banker and politician in the Republic of China, who served as Minister of Finance.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期的政治及军事领导人。
description.en: A political and military leader of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的创建政党之一，在1928年至1949年间为中国的执政党。
description.en: One of the founding political parties of the Republic of China, and was the ruling party in China from 1928 to 1949.

description.zh-cn: 中国的顶尖高等学府之一。
description.en: One of the top institutions of higher learning in China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国建国初期针对知识分子进行的政治运动。
description.en: A political campaign targeting intellectuals in the early years of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国第一次全国人口普查

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一次全国人口普查
en: First National Population Census of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国于1953年进行的首次全国性人口普查。
description.en: The first national census conducted by the People's Republic of China in 1953.

description.zh-cn: 由马寅初提出的理论著作，主张控制中国的人口增长。
description.en: A theoretical work by Ma Yinchu advocating for the control of China's population growth.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、政治家，中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和第一代最高领导人。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary and politician, the main founder and first paramount leader of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的高级领导人之一。
description.en: One of the senior leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1957年在中国大陆发起的一场政治运动，旨在打击被认为是“右派”的知识分子和异议人士。
description.en: A political campaign launched in mainland China in 1957 to crack down on intellectuals and dissidents deemed to be "rightists".

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命结束后，中国纠正文革时期错误的一段时期。
description.en: A period after the Cultural Revolution during which China corrected the mistakes of that era.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国共产党中央委员会总书记，是改革开放时期的重要领导人，主持了平反冤假错案工作。
description.en: Former General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, an important leader during the reform and opening-up period who presided over the rehabilitation of victims of wrongful persecution.

description.zh-cn: 中国的全国性人口科学学术团体。
description.en: A national academic society for population science in China.

description.zh-cn: 浙江省的一个县，现为县级市嵊州市。
description.en: A county in Zhejiang Province, now the county-level city of Shengzhou.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的首都。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一任国务院总理。
description.en: The first Premier of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国计划生育

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国计划生育
en: Family planning in the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政府为控制人口增长而实施的一项基本国策。
description.en: A basic national policy implemented by the government of the People's Republic of China to control population growth.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要领导人之一，曾任中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: One of the main leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as the Chairman of the PRC.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导机关。
description.en: The highest leading body of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 马寅初的妾。
description.en: Concubine of Ma Yinchu.

description.zh-cn: 马寅初的妻子。
description.en: Wife of Ma Yinchu.

description.zh-cn: 马寅初的父亲。
description.en: Father of Ma Yinchu.

description.zh-cn: 马寅初出生于浙江嵊县。
description.en: Ma Yinchu was born in Sheng County, Zhejiang.

description.zh-cn: 马寅初于1903年考入天津北洋大学学习矿冶专业。
description.en: Ma Yinchu was admitted to Peiyang University in Tianjin in 1903 to study metallurgy.

description.zh-cn: 马寅初于1910年获得耶鲁大学经济学硕士学位。
description.en: Ma Yinchu obtained a master's degree in economics from Yale University in 1910.

description.zh-cn: 马寅初于1914年获得哥伦比亚大学经济学博士学位。
description.en: Ma Yinchu obtained a Ph.D. in economics from Columbia University in 1914.

description.zh-cn: 马寅初获得博士学位后，在纽约大学研究会计及统计学。
description.en: After receiving his Ph.D., Ma Yinchu conducted research in accounting and statistics at New York University.

description.zh-cn: 时任北京大学校长的蔡元培招聘马寅初回国出任北京大学经济学教授。
description.en: Cai Yuanpei, then president of Peking University, recruited Ma Yinchu to return to China and serve as a professor of economics at the university.

description.zh-cn: 马寅初公开支持俄国十月革命，和李大钊成为好友。
description.en: Ma Yinchu publicly supported the October Revolution in Russia and became good friends with Li Dazhao.

description.zh-cn: 九一八事变后，马寅初发表文章批判蒋介石的“不抵抗政策”和“攘外安内”政策。
description.en: After the Mukden Incident, Ma Yinchu published articles criticizing Chiang Kai-shek's policy of non-resistance and his policy of 'internal pacification before external resistance'.

description.zh-cn: 马寅初在立法院会议上激烈责难财政部长孔祥熙的金融政策。
description.en: Ma Yinchu fiercely criticized Finance Minister H. H. Kung's financial policies during a Legislative Yuan session.

description.zh-cn: 因猛烈谴责国民党政府，马寅初于1941年12月被当局逮捕，先后拘禁在贵州息烽集中营及江西上饶集中营，直至1942年8月获释。
description.en: Due to his strong condemnation of the Kuomintang government, Ma Yinchu was arrested by the authorities in December 1941 and detained successively in the Xifeng and Shangrao concentration camps until his release in August 1942.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国建国初期，马寅初推动了对知识分子的“思想改造运动”。
description.en: In the early days of the People's Republic of China, Ma Yinchu promoted the 'Thought Reform Movement' targeting intellectuals.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国第一次全国人口普查

description.zh-cn: 马寅初推动了1953年的中华人民共和国第一次全国人口普查。
description.en: Ma Yinchu promoted the first national population census of the People's Republic of China in 1953.

description.zh-cn: 马寅初于1957年发表《新人口论》，提出控制人口增长。
description.en: Ma Yinchu published his "New Population Theory" in 1957, proposing the control of population growth.

description.zh-cn: 马寅初的《新人口论》遭到毛泽东的反对，随后马寅初遭到批判。
description.en: Ma Yinchu's "New Population Theory" was opposed by Mao Zedong, leading to subsequent criticism of Ma.

description.zh-cn: 马寅初的《新人口论》遭到康生的反对，随后马寅初遭到批判。
description.en: Ma Yinchu's "New Population Theory" was opposed by Kang Sheng, leading to subsequent criticism of Ma.

description.zh-cn: 自1957年反右运动起，马寅初及其《新人口论》逐渐遭到全国性的批判，并于1960年被迫辞去北京大学校长职务。
description.en: Starting from the Anti-Rightist Campaign in 1957, Ma Yinchu and his "New Population Theory" were subjected to nationwide criticism, forcing him to resign as president of Peking University in 1960.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共中央组织部长的胡耀邦在审阅马寅初的材料后，推动了为马寅初平反的工作。
description.en: Hu Yaobang, then head of the CCP Central Committee's Organization Department, reviewed Ma Yinchu's case files and promoted his political rehabilitation.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央于1979年批复同意为马寅初平反，恢复其名誉。
description.en: In 1979, the Central Committee of the CCP approved the decision to rehabilitate Ma Yinchu and restore his reputation.

description.zh-cn: 1972年，马寅初患直肠癌，经周恩来总理批示，得以进行手术治疗。
description.en: In 1972, Ma Yinchu was diagnosed with rectal cancer and received surgical treatment following the approval of Premier Zhou Enlai.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国计划生育

description.zh-cn: 刘少奇于1954年主持召开中央第一次人口与计划生育座谈会，并表示党赞成节育。
description.en: In 1954, Liu Shaoqi presided over the first central symposium on population and family planning, stating that the Party approved of birth control.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国计划生育

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东于1956年主持制订《全国农业发展纲要》，提倡有计划地生育。
description.en: In 1956, Mao Zedong presided over the formulation of the National Program for Agricultural Development, which advocated for planned childbirth.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国计划生育

description.zh-cn: 马寅初是中国计划生育政策的最早倡导者之一。
description.en: Ma Yinchu was one of the earliest advocates for China's family planning policy.

position.zh-cn: 教授、教务长、校长、名誉校长
position.en: Professor, Dean of Studies, President, Honorary President

description.zh-cn: 马寅初自1915年起在北京大学任教，后担任教务长。1951年至1960年任北京大学校长，1979年被任命为名誉校长。
description.en: Ma Yinchu began teaching at Peking University in 1915 and later served as Dean of Studies. He was the President of Peking University from 1951 to 1960 and was appointed Honorary President in 1979.

description.zh-cn: 马寅初于1949年8月被任命为浙江大学校长，任职至1951年。
description.en: Ma Yinchu was appointed President of Zhejiang University in August 1949 and served until 1951.

description.zh-cn: 1981年2月中国人口学会成立，马寅初被推举为名誉会长。
description.en: When the China Population Association was established in February 1981, Ma Yinchu was elected as its Honorary President.

description.zh-cn: 马庆常是马寅初的父亲。
description.en: Ma Qingchang was the father of Ma Yinchu.

description.zh-cn: 张团妹是马寅初的妻子，两人于1901年结婚。
description.en: Zhang Tuanmei was Ma Yinchu's wife; they married in 1901.

description.zh-cn: 王仲贞是马寅初的妾，两人于1917年结婚。
description.en: Wang Zhongzhen was Ma Yinchu's concubine; they married in 1917.
